name: Final Frontier (JackVR)
description: Final Frontier is a virtual reality game for the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, and Windows Mixed Reality Headsets. Final Frontier is a space defense game inspired by arcade games like Space Invaders and Galaga. You stand as the last ship in Earth's defensive fleet, guarding the planet against an onslaught of alien invaders. Using the motion tracked controller as your ship, you must shoot and knock ships out of the solar system and destroy the mother ship to save the planet!
